headline: Ohio Republican Senate candidate gains major endorsement
author: Stan Boney
sentences: BOARDMAN, Ohio (WKBN) — Ohio Republican Senate candidate Jane Timken was in Boardman Thursday evening and she brought with her a major endorsement.
Portman also said that Timken was not only the best candidate to win the May 3 primary but also the best candidate to win the general election.
“I’m honored to have Senator Portman’s endorsement, and obviously this is his seat and to have his endorsement it means the world to me.
Timken was joined by fellow Republican, Senator Rob Portman, who’s endorsing Timken over the seven other candidates in the race.
She’s also someone who knows how to bring people together and get stuff done.
She’s a person I know who will represent Ohio well, understands Ohio.
They appeared at the Mahoning County Republican Party headquarters.
Senator Portman is not running for re-election.
I’ve seen that in her,” said Portman.
Big shoes to fill,” said Timken.
